name: Dizzard Wizzard
description:
Welcome to Dizzard Wizzard!

You are a young wizzarding adept, who is seeking great knowledge in the unstable arcanes of magic elements.

Try using different magic elements combos to come up with new spells. Watch out thou, magic is very unstable and can be harmfull for the ones who are not certain of it. 

Controls:

Arrows - movement

W/S/A/D - magic elements (spell casting)

ALt + F4 - Exit game

Spells

Fireball = D -> A

WaterShield = W -> S

...There's more, but you need to discover them in the game!

Team

Our 3rd attempt on making a 3D game together at Ludum jams. 4 of us in the bulding and one online. Loads of pizza, beer and fun. We feel like this is the best one we've made so far, certainly the most organized, as we used our experience from all of the previous editions we took part in. 

Art: Alicja

VFX: Pączek

Programming: Ryjcu, Lucy

Sound and music: Cebula

Chicken asset was premade by Pączek

Animations: Mixamo
